$line = STDIN.read $caret = ENV['TM_LINE_INDEX'].to_i
class String def without_suffix(suffix) self[0, self.length - suffix.length] end
def without_suffix!(suffix) self.replace(self.without_suffix(suffix)) end end
def message_context(string) mes = message string, false if mes [string.without_suffix(mes), string[(string.length - mes.length), mes.length]] else [nil, nil] end end
def message(string, check_brackets = true) out = "" if check_brackets b = string[/\]\s*$/] if b string = string.without_suffix b out = b + out else return nil end end sel = selector(string) if sel string = string.without_suffix sel rec = receiver(string) if rec string = string.without_suffix rec out = rec + sel + out else return nil end else return nil end if check_brackets b = string[/\[\s*$/] if b string = string.without_suffix b out = b + out else return nil end end out end
def receiver(string) string[/[^"'\[\]\(\)\s\=\+\-\*\/,\\:]+\s*$/] || message(string) || at_string(string) end
def at_string(string) string[/@".*?"\s*$/] end
def c_string(string) string[/(["']).*?\1\s*$/] end
def argument(string) string[/[^"'\[\]\(\)\s\=\+\-\*\/,\\:]+\s*$/] || message(string) || at_string(string) || c_string(string) end
def argument_list(string) accum = "" while match = (string[/,\s*$/] || argument(string)) accum = match + accum string = string.without_suffix match end accum.empty? ? nil : accum end
def selector(string) arg = argument string if arg string = string.without_suffix arg sel = string[/[^"'\[\]\(\)\s\=\+\-\*\/,\\:]+:\s*$/] if sel sel + arg else arg end end end
def balance_close_bracket(line) before_caret, after_caret = line[0..($caret - 1)], line[$caret..-1] start, rest = message_context before_caret if start.nil? or rest.nil? then line.gsub /^(\s*)(.+)$/, '\1[\2' else start + "[" + rest + (after_caret || "") end end
def snippet_escape(str) # these characters have special meaning in snippets str.gsub(/[$`\\]/, '\\\\\0') end
open_count = $line.count "[" close_count = $line.count "]"
left = $line[0...$caret] left = balance_close_bracket left if open_count == close_count
right = $line[$caret..-1]
print "#{snippet_escape left}]${0}#{snippet_escape right}"
